question:
Is the following statement something you would say?
"I don’t really agree with anything accepted by established authorities"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Rules are ultimately unnecessary"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"If experts agree on something, it is probably true"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Authority figures usually know best and I should obey them most of the time"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Senior officials probably know better than me about certain issues"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I think people should support the decisions and instructions of legitimate authorities"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I don’t care what others say--I can act however I want to"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Nobody knows more than I do"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I do not need to listen to authorities; I have my own opinion"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Religion and authorities should be questioned at all times"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I generally accept the advice of authorities who have more experience than I do"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"The authorities should be respected and obeyed"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I enjoy being rebellious"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"The authorities such as my government know more than I do about many things, so I should generally obey their recommendations"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"There are no authorities in the world who have more insights and knowledge than I do"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Experts generally know better than I do, so I should trust them"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"People in charge have authority over me and ought to be obeyed"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"My own judgment is as good as that of the experts"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I make all my decisions by myself"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Authorities such as my boss or teacher know more than me, so I should do as they say"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"People in charge deserve respect and deference"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"The authorities know better than I do, so I accept their decisions"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I respect rules and am generally willing to comply with directives from authority figures such as politicians, religious leaders, experts, and teachers"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I often question authority"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"My judgment is better than that of authorities"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I know more than authorities"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Authority figures such as my parents and teachers are usually correct and know what is best"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I can trust my own judgment and always act independently"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I go with my own judgment rather than what authorities suggest I should do"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I know better than any authority what is right and wrong for my life"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"My own judgment is more important than what authorities tell me to do"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I think it is always best to make my own decisions and be free of outside influences"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I follow the advice and guidance of authorities such as physicians and government officials"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Everyone should distrust authority"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"People should distrust those in positions of authority"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Authorities know better than I do, so I should respect their decisions"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Obedience and respect for authority are virtues"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Teachers and authorities often know better than I do"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Professional authorities like doctors and professors usually know best and we should adopt their recommendations"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am accountable only to myself"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"My beliefs are superior to the beliefs of authorities"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I don’t need to rely on my church leaders, teachers, elders, or political leaders"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I know better than my doctors regarding medical decisions"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"People should respect authority figures"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Authorities like my parents and teachers are usually right about things, so I usually follow their advice"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Competent authorities, such as respected religious leaders, parents and so on know better than me and probably have my best interests at heart"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Experts know more than laypeople"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I should respect the decisions of authority figures"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I can solve all my problems by myself"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"My judgments are superior to those of recognized authorities"
